logsCommand.description: Setup the logs channel for the bot.

add.description: Add a logs channel to the bot.

channel.description: The channel where the logs should be sent.

type.description: The type of logs that should be sent.

alreadySet.title: ERROR
alreadySet.description: The logs channel for the type `{type}` is already set. Do you want to delete it?

success.title: LOGS
success.description: The logs channel for the type `{type}` has been set to {channel}.

successfulDelete.title: LOGS
successfulDelete.description: The logs channel for the type `{type}` has been removed.

cancelledDelete.title: LOGS
cancelledDelete.description: The deletion of the logs channel has been cancelled.

remove.description: Remove a logs channel from the bot.

type.description: The type of logs that should be sent.

notSet.title: ERROR
notSet.description: The logs channel for the type `{type}` is not set. Use the `/setup logs add` to set it.

success.title: LOGS
success.description: The logs channel for the type `{type}` has been removed

langCommand.description: Change the server's language for the bot.

language.description: Choose the language you want to use for the bot.

noPerms.title: ERROR
noPerms.description: You don't have permission to change the bot's language.

invalidLang.title: ERROR
invalidLang.description: The language you selected is invalid.

success.title: LANGUAGE
success.description: You have successfully changed the bot's language to `{locale}`.

playCommand.description: Play music in a voice channel.

query.description: The title or URL of the song you want to play.

noVoiceChannel.title: ERROR
noVoiceChannel.description: You need to be in a voice channel to play music.

noResults.title: ERROR
noResults.description: No results found for your search.

loadFailed.title: ERROR
loadFailed.description: An error occurred while loading the song.

success.title: MUSIC
success.description: Your playlist with `{size}` songs has been added to the queue, starting with the first song.

playlist.title: PLAYLIST
playlist.description: Added `{size}` songs from playlist `{name}` to the queue.

queue.title: QUEUE
queue.description: You added `{title}` by `{artist}` to the queue.

stopCommand.description: Stop the music and clear the queue.

noVoiceChannel.title: ERROR
noVoiceChannel.description: The bot is not in a voice channel.

notInSameChannel.title: ERROR
notInSameChannel.description: You need to be in the same voice channel as the bot to stop the music.

success.title: MUSIC
success.description: The queue has been cleared and the music has been stopped.

noVoiceChannel.title: ERROR
noVoiceChannel.description: The bot is not in a voice channel.

notInSameChannel.title: ERROR
notInSameChannel.description: You must be in the same voice channel as the bot to skip the song.

noMoreSongs.title: ERROR
noMoreSongs.description: There are no more songs in the queue.

success.title: MUSIC
success.description: The current song has been skipped.

loopCommand.description: Toggle looping of the current song.

noVoiceChannel.title: ERROR
noVoiceChannel.description: The bot is not in a voice channel.

notInSameChannel.title: ERROR
notInSameChannel.description: You must be in the same voice channel as the bot to change the loop.

shuffleCommand.description: Change the order of the queue.

noVoiceChannel.title: ERROR
noVoiceChannel.description: The bot is not in a voice channel.

notInSameChannel.title: ERROR
notInSameChannel.description: You must be in the same voice channel as the bot to shuffle the queue.

noMoreSongs.title: ERROR
noMoreSongs.description: The queue is empty, there's nothing to shuffle.
